title: #JustLowEloThings~
body:
~Jungler focuses the enemy team while drag is being taken
~Jungler ragequits
~ADC Rage quits
~Top rage quits
~Map is darker than the insides of my p------------- moving on
~Kills > Turrets 
Feel free to add on

replies.body:
Flame the Jungler


Flame


The



Fucking




Jungler

I remember playing kindred once, I was doing decently, like 12/6 or so, and the top laner was like "omg fking noob jg no help" When for 1) it was  a lane in their favor and 2) they were constantly pushed. I literally hate jungling lmao

I just stick to master Yi tbh :^}. When my team complains about me not ganking because they're trying to 1v1 the 7/0 fiora whose Jungler comes to feed the lane, I just tell them that I don't gank. I come to your lane to tax you by killing your enemy laner :^}

Team doesnt group. 
Jungler misses 3 smites in a row.
ADC engages first.
Team doesnt listen to pings.
Mid laner/Top laner doesnt follow their laner.
Mid laner doesnt roam.
Top laner saves tp to tp top lane.
Bot lane feeds as usual.
Support doesnt build ss.
Top builds an offmeta build claiming it works.

> [{quoted}](name=ItsOrval,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WYQPzPdG,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-03-05T21:19:38.999+0000)
>

> Bot lane feeds as usual

Always when I play top. Without a doubt
"support" bran malz or zyra and they start doran's ring and don't even use their trinket (this is what happens when i don't support) ._.
I FEEL THIS SO MUCH OMGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG
Tfw the Lux support tells me to stfu when I point out why she/he started dorans when she isn't gonna lasthit
{{item:3092}} {{champion:81}}

Top mains think that the game revolves entirely around them and flames jungle for not being their ~~bitch~~ ~~support~~ babysitter.

I honestly hate most top mains because of this reoccurring issue in my games.

Technically its better for the jungler to camp top lane because its much more easier to gank than someone who has a lot of escape. Most top laners dont have much to counter junglers besides {{champion:420}}. 

Mid usually has tons of stuns, a way to escape, and a way to kite the jungler and mid laner. The lane is also very short so the mid laner can back easily. The only junglers who can gank mid well is {{champion:60}} if she lands her web, and {{champion:64}} and level 6. The others are meh/decent. 

Bot lane the support is always gonna fuck you over when the jungler ganks. {{champion:412}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:12}}, not very easy to gank those type of champs when they have an easy counter fuck towards junglers.

Top lane is the best one because of champs like {{champion:126}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:240}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:133}} and many others. Theyre all squishy damage champs. And if the lane is pushed to your tower, then the jungler should gank. Because that enemy top laner would be fucked.
Pretty sure you meant pockets, but for some reason there was a line that appeared instead.
Pockets?
Yes, darker than the insides of your pockets.
Team ignores pings numerous times then blames the lane where the enemy roamed from for "feeding them" afterwards regardless of if they have died to the roamer or not.
{{champion:67}}  1/15
Give up first blood? Go suicide into the enemy 5 more times and wonder why you can't win
{{champion:36}} support
That one guy who tells the other guy to stop feeding even though he's 0/1

Blaming everyone else except themselves.
Failing to realize own faults.
First time champions in ranked after they get a good game with them in normals. like ffs, how do you feed against a first time ranked Ryze.

Yasuo jg and Nasus mid with 1 kill *or* assist, not both, for each of them, for like the first 20 minutes of the game, while the Nasus is shit talking everyone else on the team.

Dude said I was feeding at 0/3/3 when he was 0/1/1. Like...I can't...
